title: [GSoC Snippet] 22/07/2014
author: Maciej (Developer Website)
content:
[code] fixed small issues with feedbook gem, now everything should work fine. I still need some time to write tests and after it I will add email and IRC gateway. I added source code of my gem to GitHub and I will add it to rubygems after I did some tests. :)
